summary.p-1: Cookies are small files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
summary.p-2: We use cookies to make our services work and collect information about how you use our service.

essential.heading: Essential cookies
essential.p-1: Essential cookies keep your information secure while you use our services. We do not need to ask permission to use them.

row-1.col-2: Saves your language settings for English or Welsh

row-2.col-2: Keeps you signed in while you are using the service

analytics.heading: Cookies that measure website use (Google Analytics)
analytics.p-1: With your permission, we use Google Analytics to collect data about how you use our services. This information helps us to improve our service.
analytics.p-2: Google is not allowed to use or share our analytics data with anyone.
analytics.p-3: Google Analytics stores anonymised information about:
analytics.li-1: how you got to our service
analytics.li-2: the pages you visit on our services and how long you spend on them
analytics.li-3: any errors you see while using our service

row-1.col-2: Counts how many people visit the website by checking if they have visited before

row-2.col-2: Counts how many people visit the website by checking if they have visited before

row-3.col-2: Used to manage the rate at which page view requests are made

radios.heading: Do you want to accept cookies that measure your website use?
radios.accept: Use cookies that measure my website use
radios.reject: Do not use cookies that measure my website use
